statements: DELETE FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 101 AND request_type = 'Change Request';
DELETE FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE request_id IN (SELECT request_id FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE escalation_priority > 3);
DELETE FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE current_status = 'Pending' AND (escalation_priority = 1 OR escalation_priority = 2);
DELETE FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 100 AND agreement_name = 'Basic';
DELETE FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SLA_monitoring WHERE sla_id = (SELECT sla_id FROM Escalation_prioritization WHERE priority_level = 1);
DELETE FROM SLAs WHERE id = 1 AND escalation_level > 2;
DELETE FROM UrgentSupportRequests WHERE request_id = 1005 AND urgency_level >= 3;
DELETE FROM SupportEscalations WHERE escalation_id IN (SELECT escalation_id FROM SupportEscalations WHERE escalation_status = 'Resolved');
DELETE FROM SLAs WHERE due_date < NOW();
DELETE FROM Escalations WHERE sla_id IN (SELECT id FROM SLAs WHERE priority > 3);
